document.full_text: bahrain released a prominent blogger but detained several other people, including a pro-opposition doctor, the latest in a series of arrests since a crackdown on protests, opposition sources said on friday.
document.title: bahrain steps up detentions, frees prominent blogger
lines_and_colors: bahrain released a prominent blogger but detained several other people, including a pro-opposition doctor, the latest in a series of arrests since a crackdown on protests, opposition sources said on friday.
